title: Claude Debussy - The Complete Works For Piano (4Cd)
description:
Claude Debussy - The Complete Works For Piano (4Cd)

mp3 320 kbits

1997

"These classic performances belong in the collection of anyone who cares about Debussy's piano music. Walter Gieseking's career was a troubled one--his pandering to the Nazi party cast a shadow over his last years, but the greatest irony of all was that this German nationalist turned out to be the greatest exponent of French music of his era. His Debussy playing marries an effortlessly subtle control of the keyboard to a real sense of fantasy. The music truly shimmers in his hands, and despite the limited range of the mono recording, the ear quickly adjusts. This is, in short, one of those classic recordings that critics and music lovers have enjoyed for nearly 50 years. So should you."
David Hurwitz

--------------- Artists ---------------
Klavier: Walter Gieseking
conducted by: Kurt Schroder
Orchester des Hessischen Rundfunks
